## Collider.scale() method

Scales the collider by the given scalar. Only ball, block, capsule, cone, cylinder, round cylinder are supported.

**Signature:**

```typescript
scale(scalar: number): void;
```

## Parameters

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

scalar


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

The scalar to scale the collider by.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
